src:
Pogrešanega 14-letnika so našli
05 Nov 2019, 07:28 by Spletno uredništvo

Policija je preklicala iskanje 14-letnega Domna Gradišnika. S pomočjo informacij občana so ga našli v zapuščenem objektu v Šentjurju. Z njim je vse v redu, so sporočili s Policijske uprave Celje.



Foto: STA
text:
The missing 14-year-old was found
05 Nov 2019, 07:28 by Web Editing

Police have canceled the search for 14-year-old Dom Gradisnik. With the help of information from a citizen, he was found in an abandoned facility in Šentjur. Everything is fine with him, the Celje Police Directorate said.



Photo: STA
